title: Anyone going to Anime Impulse?
text: I'm looking for a ride for the 19th. Willing to venmo!

title: Church weekly rides
text: Hey guys, I attend church in Issaquah every Sunday and am willing to offer rides. Would anyone be interested?

title: Is driving worth it?
text: I'm considering offering rides on here and was curious how others' experiences have been?

title: Parking
text: I hate iParq and am looking for alternatives. Does anyone know if there are other lots near campus that are better?

title: Weekly Park Visit?
text: Hey guys, I'm trying to be more active and hoping to explore more parks in Seattle. Would anyone be interested in joining me for a weekly walk every Saturday?
